message.body: are you going to church tomorrow?
Nope. I'm in Tennessee.
how did i not know this?!
meet this survivor guy with a tv show.
what?
I don't know?! We left at like 1 am and just got to my granddaddys house a little while ago. We stopped at this stupid knife store so Amanda and Michael could
oh, there's the first half of the message
Hahahahah
who was the survival guy? also are you ready to eat your biscuits and gravy?!?!
Les Stroud, I think? And please, don't jinx me. :(
oh man, les stroud is awesome. he's like the "realest" one of those survival people. and i will totally jinx you. you should also drink a bunch of eggnog.
Yeah, i was just not happy about literally getting off work and getting straight into the car for 7 hours. and wish I could. I do love egg nog.
did you sleep in the car at all. i know it's not easy for you.
I did, but car sleep sucks. Especially because I worked two doubles in a row the past two days. :(
oh man! that is tiring. you need some biscuits and gravy to revive you.
You'll regret these biscuit and gravy references.
:C but they seem pretty good right now while you're in another state.
Seem being the key word there. >:D
now i'm worried, haha.
As you should be. But really, I wish I was home :( this is already really boring and awkward.
how long are you staying?
Just tonight. Leaving tomorrow morning.
that's not so bad!
I know, I know. Time just STOPS here.
that's an old people thing, i think.
Yeah. He can't really hear or see us so it makes it difficult to have conversations. So his girlfriend Frankie just does all the talking for us.
we like her, right?
Yes, she's so adorable and old. And she calls him out on his bullshit stories about how he has girls all over him.
how could he think that? hahaha
I really don't know. He seems to think he's some hot stuff.
maybe because he can't see or hear.
Probably one of the main reasons.
if i was almost blind i would just imagine that i always looked awesome. instant self-esteem boost.
